version_description:
- Support for iOS 10
- Chat overflow menu shows count of photos received
- Navigation buttons when viewing profiles have a larger tap area
- Received location chats also preview your current location
- Stability and performance improvements

- Access the new Position field from edit profile
- Filter guys by their Position as an XTRA subscriber
- Edge swipe from the profile or chat screen to easily navigate back
- Stability and performance improvements
Thanks for using Grindr. We update the app regularly to make it faster and better than ever. Get the latest version for all available features and improvements.

• Allow phone to remain unlocked while using Grindr, configurable in settings
• Crash fixes and stability improvements
Thanks for using Grindr! We update the app regularly to make it faster and better than ever. Get the latest version for all available features and improvements.

• Chat message delivery confirmation
• Use 3D Touch to 'peek' into a profile from the grid of guys
• Now available in Spanish

• Inbox filters allow for easier access to conversations with unread messages or with favorites
• Grindr Messages will periodically deliver feature announcements and special offers right to your inbox
• Now available in Portuguese
Thanks for using Grindr! We update the app regularly to make it faster and better than ever. Get the latest version for all available features and improvements.

• Fixes connection issues when using iOS 10.2 on T-Mobile USA carrier networks
• Crash fixes and stability improvements

Thanks for using Grindr! We update the app regularly to make it faster and better than ever. Get the latest version for all available features and improvements.

Introducing Gaymoji

Not sure what to say? Want a new way to break the ice? We speak your language.

Check out Gaymoji. Now you have 500+ stickers in Grindr to say exactly what you want when you chat. Some are naughty, some are nice, you decide what’s right.

Go forth and Gaymoji

Introducing Fresh Faces

Want to meet more guys? We heard you and created Fresh Faces to help make it happen.

At the top of the grid, you'll get a collection of new users in your area. More profiles are added regularly, just pull your screen to refresh.

Now meeting someone new is easier. All you have to do is say 'Hi'.
Thanks for using Grindr! We update the app regularly to make it faster and better than ever. Get the latest version for all available features and improvements.

Introducing Taps!

Break the ice - say hi, tell him he’s hot, or let him know you’re looking without typing a word.

With Grindr XTRA, you can also filter your Taps by intention.

Send a Tap from the bottom of any profile, there are three new ways to make something happen.

Filters for Messages are now located at the bottom of the inbox.

We heard your feedback. If you are an XTRA subscriber but aren't receiving access to XTRA features, you can now use "Restore Purchase" under Settings -> Account to restore your access.

We're excited to announce three new features!

- Connect even more quickly now by sending an audio message in a conversation. Don't see it yet? Don't worry, it's coming worldwide soon.

For XTRA subscribers:

- Profiles that you've recently chatted with will now be highlighted on the grid.
- "Read" indicators are now available for chats you've sent.
